Home About us Contact us Tours

Re-cycle offers you guided tours around different towns in Norway.

Guided Tours

If you are on a vaccation it's nice to see the attractions the places you visit has to offer.
Here at Re-cycle our goal is for you to see the best of the town you are visiting from the seat of a bike.

Joining one of our tours will not only let you see more of the place you are visiting, but you will also get loads of fresh air.

We have tours that cover all people. From well trained to couch potatoes, adults to kids and optimists to pesimists.

If you want to know more about us and our services feel free to navigate around this site. And if you have more questions, feel free to contact one of our offices.

Hope to see you on one of our tours soon.
